messages.title: GETTING THINGS DONE IN ROSSENDALE
messages.content: In recent years I have spoken to literally thousands of people across Rossendale. You tell me that you are not being listened to by the people making big decisions which affect your family, your finances and the place you live. I want to change that. That's why I've been going door-to-door, street-by-street and organising community meetings right across the constituency: to listen to you. That's the sort of MP I would be - not voting in parliament against local people's interests but getting things done, doing what you want me to do.

images.caption: Will and your Labour team called today

leaflet.additionalNotes: Read my 5 point plan to make Rossendale even better inside
